bibl.title: Territory of Washington V. Sterling P. White. Criminal
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

div1.p: TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON, County of Spokane } SS. Territory of Washington, Plaintiff vs. S.P. White, Defendant } In the District Court of the Territory of Washington and for the FirstFourth Judicial District thereof, holding terms at Cheney, Spokane County, in said Territory To the Sheriff of Lincoln County, Greeting: IN THE NAME OF THE UNITED STATES, You are hereby commanded to summon S.L. Shoot to be and appear before the District Court aforesaid at the Court House, in Cheney, in said County, on the forthwith day of A.D. 1885, at o'clock, M. to there give evi- dence in the above entitiled cause on the part of said Defendant S.P. White Witness the Hon. George Turner Associate Judge of the Supreme Court of Washington Territory, and Judge of said Court, and the Seal there- of affixed, this 17 day of April A.D. 1885 Kate W. Feauerbach Clerk. By R. Dtrobach Deputy.

TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON, County of Spokane Lincoln } SS. I hereby certify that I served the within Subpoena on the within named witness by reading the same to him in said County, on this 20 day of April A.D. 1885 John Cody Sheriff By J. N. Friedlander Deputy.

S.L. Short Case No. Subpoena In the District Court of the Territory of Washington, and for the First Judicial District thereof, holding Terms at Cheney, Spokane County, in said Territory Plaintiff vs. Defendant Returned and Filed this 28 day of, April A.D. 1885 Kate W. Feuerbach Clerk. By. R. Dtrobach Deputy. Sheriff's Fees Serving 1 names at 40 40 Mileage 146 miles at 10 1460 Total, ---$1500
